title: Google\Cloud\Container\V1\MaintenanceWindow
name: MaintenanceWindow
description:
MaintenanceWindow defines the maintenance window to be used for the cluster.

Generated from protobuf message google.container.v1.MaintenanceWindow

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.daily_maintenance_window
params.description: DailyMaintenanceWindow specifies a daily maintenance operation window.

params.name: data.recurring_window
params.description: RecurringWindow specifies some number of recurring time periods for maintenance to occur. The time windows may be overlapping. If no maintenance windows are set, maintenance can occur at any time.

params.name: data.maintenance_exclusions
params.description: Exceptions to maintenance window. Non-emergency maintenance should not occur in these windows.
